comment: If England stays on it's current downward trajectory becoming Englandistan, they WILL be ruled over by a Judeo-Quadroon Kang! Yo Harry, gib dat boi an apostrophe fo a nigga's name

comment: I've never associated anyone in the modern monarchy with having a solid work ethic, except Princess Di, but there are better terms for such.
amr:

(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (a / associate-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a2 / anyone
                  :location (m / monarchy
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / modern-02))
                  :ARG2-of (e / except-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Princess"
                                    :op2 "Di"))))
            :ARG2 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (e2 / ethic
                        :mod (w / work-01)
                        :ARG1-of (s / solid-02)))
            :time (e3 / ever))
      :ARG2 (t / term
            :purpose e2
            :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (g / good-02
                        :ARG1 t)
                  :ARG3 (m3 / more))))
